page.title: 12MARYKIRK OLDER PEOPLE 1
page.content: Many people who live in the older parts of the village have retired from full time employment such as personnel manager, farm worker, hospital driver and cook in domestic service. Some have lived in Marykirk for as many as sixty years while others have recently moved into the village. Marykirk senior citizens have many interests including knitting socks, bowling, writing, reading, cooking, gardening and sewing tapestry pictures. Some are members of local organizations like the Bowling Club, the Old Age Pensioners' Association which meets in the school, the Church and Hall Committee.
